## Python's Built-in `hash()` Function

::: {.columns}
::: {.column width="60%"}

```python
print(hash("apple"))
print(hash("banana"))
print(hash("cherry"))
```

> Note: Python's `hash()` is salted by default â€” values vary per session.

To make it reproducible:

```bash
PYTHONHASHSEED=0 python script.py
```
